home.about_p1: Hello, I'm Jean de DIEU Yaba!
home.about_p2: I'm a full-stack developer with over 3 years of experience, having started my career in back-end development before evolving into building complete, well-structured web solutions.
home.about_p3: I design performant, secure, and user-focused web applications, with strong attention to architecture, maintainability, and code quality. Driven by continuous improvement, I keep learning and adapting to modern technologies to deliver reliable and scalable systems.
home.contact_content: I’m interested in freelance opportunities. However, if you have other request or question, don’t hesitate to contact me

about.first_paragraph: I am Jean de DIEU Yaba, a passionate full-stack developer with over 3 years of experience in crafting robust web applications. My journey began in back-end development, where I honed my skills in building scalable and efficient server-side solutions. Over time, I expanded my expertise to encompass full-stack development, allowing me to create comprehensive web solutions that are both user-friendly and technically sound.
about.second_paragraph: My approach to development is centered around writing clean, maintainable code and adhering to best practices. I am proficient in a variety of programming languages and frameworks, which enables me to select the right tools for each project. I am committed to continuous learning and staying updated with the latest industry trends to ensure that my solutions are modern and effective.
about.third_paragraph: Collaboration and communication are key aspects of my work ethic. I enjoy working closely with clients and team members to understand their needs and deliver solutions that exceed expectations. Whether it's developing a new feature, optimizing performance, or ensuring security, I am dedicated to delivering high-quality results that drive success.
about.fun_facts_p1: I’m hopeless at designing mockups from scratch
about.fun_facts_p2: I do full-stack development but I prefer back-end work.
about.fun_facts_p3: AI fascinates me, though I sometimes miss the human touch
about.fun_facts_p4: I love dogs, even though I don’t have one
about.fun_facts_p5: I treasure moments with family and friends
